body_html: 1d convolution would be good to have. Also I wonder if anyone would be interested in having different boundary conditions in all types of convolutions. for instance I needed to have periodic boundary conditions where the pixels on the edges are connected to pixels on opposite edges, and so on. I had to modify my training/test sets in order to account for that.

body: 1d convolution would be good to have. Also I wonder if anyone would be interested in having different boundary conditions in all types of convolutions. for instance I needed to have periodic boundary conditions where the pixels on the edges are connected to pixels on opposite edges, and so on. I had to modify my training/test sets in order to account for that.
